pkgmetadata.longdescription: IntraClass Effect Decomposition // Estimate test-retest reliability for complex sampling strategies and extract variances using IntraClass Effect Decomposition. Developed by Brandmaier et al. (2018) "Assessing reliability in neuroimaging research through intra-class effect decomposition (ICED)" doi:10.7554/eLife.35718 Also includes functions to simulate data based on sampling strategy. Unofficial version release name: "Good work squirrels".
